content.text:
# Edward Cox (canoeist)

Edward Cox (born 25 July 1985) is a British sprint canoeist who has competed since the late 2000s. He won a silver medal in the K-1  event at the 2010 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships in Poznań.
References
*[http://www.bcu.org.uk/news/world-championships-golden-crown-for-ed-mckeever British Canoe Union story on the 2010 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships.] – accessed 22 August 2010.
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20120518131334/http://zap.norex.ca/bio/athlete/355/ Canoe'09.ca profile.]
